
## Wald test

********************************************************************************

$$ \frac{ \left( \widehat{\theta} - \theta_0 \right)^2 }{ \mbox{Var}\left[ \widehat{\theta} \right] } \sim \chi_{(1)}^2 $$

Equivalently,

$$ \frac{ \left( \widehat{\theta} - \theta_0 \right) }{ \mbox{Se}\left[ \widehat{\theta} \right] } \sim N(0,1) $$

********************************************************************************
